detail_desc: Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a lace layer at the top and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, dropped shoulders and wide 3/4-length sleeves with a scalloped raw edge at the cuffs. Side pockets and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in waffled cotton jersey. Bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in waffled cotton jersey. Bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in waffled cotton jersey. Bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in waffled cotton jersey. Bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Fully lined tankini top with a V-neck, draped front section, moulded, lightly padded, moulded cups and wide, adjustable multiway shoulder straps.
Short imitation leather skirt with a high, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim at the top. Lined.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a cable-knit cotton blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Oversized jumper in a wool knit with a V-neck front and back, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Straight, ribbed hem with slits in the sides and ribbed cuffs. Longer at the back.
Oversized jumper in a wool knit with a V-neck front and back, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Straight, ribbed hem with slits in the sides and ribbed cuffs. Longer at the back.
Straight-style jumper in a rib-knit wool and mohair blend with a small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Straight-style jumper in a rib-knit wool and mohair blend with a small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
Blouse in soft, patterned twill made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck with twisted ties at the top, and long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Suede sandals with covered heels and a braided jute trim around the soles. Elastic strap over the foot, open toes and leather insoles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 9.5 cm.
Mesh gym bag with a drawstring at the top. Can be carried like a backpack. Polyester lining. Size 40x45 cm.
Blouse in a narrow-striped cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a wide flounce at the hem.
Soft, stretch waist bag designed for running with a zip at the front, an elastic strap with an adjustable hook and loop fastening, and reflective details. Size 6x24 cm.
Fitted, V-neck top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a collar and short, frill-trimmed sleeves.
Fitted, V-neck top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a collar and short, frill-trimmed sleeves.

Parka in a woven modal blend with an unlined hood, loose yoke, zip down the front and drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, elasticated cuffs, a drawstring at the hem and a single back vent. Unlined.
Sleeveless fitted top in a sturdy rib knit with a slight sheen. V-neck front and back.
Sleeveless fitted top in a sturdy rib knit with a slight sheen. V-neck front and back.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in a rib knit with a V-neck at the front, deep V-neck at the back and gently flared skirt.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in a rib knit with a V-neck at the front, deep V-neck at the back and gently flared skirt.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with pointed toes and open sides. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane soles.

Dungarees in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a chest pocket, straps with an adjustable press-stud fastening, and a fake fly. Seam at the waist with belt loops, press-studs at the sides, side pockets, fake back pockets and flap leg pockets. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y). Contrasting colour details.
Suede sandals with a wide, adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels approx. 6 cm.
Suede sandals with a wide, adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels approx. 6 cm.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a gathered empire-line seam at the top. Short cap sleeves with contrasting colour, frayed edges. Unlined.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton flannel. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Sleeveless dress in a patterned jacquard weave containing metallic threads with buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a shaped neckline and short, flounced sleeves. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a wide, elasticated seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt, side pockets and straight legs.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with short raglan sleeves and a small stand-up collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with short raglan sleeves and a small stand-up collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Skirt in a patterned cotton weave with covered elastication and a decorative grosgrain bow at the waist, and side pockets. Lined.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Cold shoulder dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, short, elasticated sleeves with a small frill trim at the shoulders, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with a heart pattern. Buttons at the back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pleated, A-line dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and pearly button at the back of the neck and short butterfly sleeves. Satin lining.
Pleated, A-line dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and pearly button at the back of the neck and short butterfly sleeves. Satin lining.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey. Racer back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and crossover shoulder straps with an open section at the back. Rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey. Racer back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and crossover shoulder straps with an open section at the back. Rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey. Racer back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and crossover shoulder straps with an open section at the back. Rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey. Racer back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and crossover shoulder straps with an open section at the back. Rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.
Cold shoulder jumpsuit in a cotton weave with elastication and a flounce at the top. Narrow shoulder straps, side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow.
Baby Exclusive. Hairband in cotton jersey with a bow at the front and elastication at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Hairband in cotton jersey with a bow at the front and elastication at the back.
Skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and an elasticated waist. Lined.
Skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and an elasticated waist. Lined.
Skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and an elasticated waist. Lined.
Flared skirt in glittery tulle with a shimmering elastic waistband with a sewn-on bow. Lined.
Flared skirt in glittery tulle with a shimmering elastic waistband with a sewn-on bow. Lined.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar, small frill trim around the armholes, buttons down the front and ties at the front of the hem.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar, small frill trim around the armholes, buttons down the front and ties at the front of the hem.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar, small frill trim around the armholes, buttons down the front and ties at the front of the hem.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton and linen weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck, buttons down the front and smocking at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton and linen weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck, buttons down the front and smocking at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.

Knee-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and short sleeves with flounced trims. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and short sleeves with flounced trims. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed sections at the knees and ribbed hems.

Parka in washed cotton twill with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and detachable hood with striped cotton poplin lining. Drawstring at the waist, handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Parka in washed cotton twill with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and detachable hood with striped cotton poplin lining. Drawstring at the waist, handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Suit trousers in woven fabric containing some wool and linen with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, look for 0712079.
Scarf in a soft rib knit with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 30x198 cm.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable imitation leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap 1.3 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of face 3 cm.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable imitation leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap 1.3 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of face 3 cm.
Pre-tied bow tie in velvet with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 10 cm.

Twill tuxedo designed to fit a small dog. Contrasting colour shirt front with a collar and hook and loop fastening, and a bow tie and shawl collar at the top. Sleeves at the front. Length excluding collar approx. 31 cm. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a square neckline, an opening with a decorative tie detail at the front and long sleeves.
Hat in felted fabric with a band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
